content:
I just noticed that the color is still green. Should this be blue?
2022-02-20-083801_905x102_scrot.png
This is definitely an artifact from the pre-rebrand days... It would be nice to update it if we have a specific proposal.
I don't think the notifications prompt particularly needs to match a brand color; I suspect the intent is just to have a banner that looks positive (i.e. not red or whatever).
